Do cars with big engines use more fuel?
```{r}
ggplot(data = mpg) +  # create a coordinate system
  geom_point(mapping = aes(x = displ, y = hwy))  # add a scatterplot layer to it
```

```{r}
ggplot(data = mpg)

nrow(mpg)
ncol(mpg)
dim(mpg)

ggplot(data = mpg) +
  geom_point(mapping = (aes(x=cyl, y=hwy)))

ggplot(data = mpg) +
  geom_point(mapping = (aes(x=drv, y=class)))
```

```{r}
ggplot(data = mpg) + 
  geom_point(mapping = aes(x = displ, y = hwy, color = class))
```
